Task ID:
\h(«Air Pirate»)Ah, Vyse, you're here.
It looks like we can access the rest of the
ship through this passage.\e

\h(«Air Pirate»)I'll guard the door. You go on ahead and secure
the rest of the ship. Go teach those Valuans a
thing or two!\c

\h(«Air Pirate»)I'll guard the door. You go on ahead and secure
the rest of the ship. Go teach those Valuans a
thing or two!\c

\h(«Alfonso»)Well… well…
Air Pirates have decided to… infest my ship.\e

\h(«Alfonso»)What?! How did you defeat my soldiers?
Heh… If you want my ship that badly, you can
have it. I'll get another.\e

\h(«Alfonso»)I am very busy. I do not have time to deal with
you personally. Now, if you'll excuse me…\e

\h(«Alfonso»)Hah! You'll never get through this door! I've
locked it from this side!\e

\h(«Vyse»)Damn… This door is solid metal.
There's no way I can force it open.\c

\h(«Alfonso»)Well… well…
Air Pirates have decided to… infest my ship.\e

\h(«Alfonso»)I am Alfonso, cherished son of Valua's most 
distinguished family, and an Admiral of the 
Imperial Armada.\e

\h(«Alfonso»)Normally, lowlifes such as yourselves would 
never have the opportunity to bask in such 
greatness. Consider yourselves fortunate.\e

\h(«Vyse»)I never thought someone of your… stature would 
stoop to kidnapping.\e

\h(«Alfonso»)Hah!
You're very observant for a Rogue. However,
I cannot waste my time dealing with you.\e

\h(«Alfonso»)I simply must get going.  I think I shall have 
you exterminated like the pests you are…\e
